description: CSS file containing variables for theme management and styles for the main application layout and components.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container styles including text alignment, background color, and transitions.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header section of the application, including layout and color transitions.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application, with color transitions.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including positioning, colors, and hover effects.
